attributes.action: cancel any plans to give this women a state funeral,which will amount to an insult to what used to be the working class,the backbone  of what used to be GR.Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
since this women got into power,she developed a personal war against the miners,and heavy industry in this country.
We are now coming to the end of our second 
generation of no proper apprenticeships coming through real time served jobs/trades,we are now a country of d.i.y&n.v.q

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
